model conﬁgurations to evaluate.
The conﬁgurations assume each of the AR, MA, and I components for trend and seasonality
are low order, e.g. oﬀ (0) or in [1,2]. You may want to extend these ranges if you believe the
order may be higher. An optional list of seasonal periods can be speciﬁed, and you could even
change the function to specify other elements that you may know about your time series. In
theory, there are 1,296 possible model conﬁgurations to evaluate, but in practice, many will not
